title: Own Your Piece Of Beach Front Paradise - LIP 157
details: LIP-157 This small but well positioned 30 Perches of land is narrow and has wonderful sea frontage. There is a small house on the property consisting of 3 rooms, a living room and a kitchen. Electricity and water are already connected. The property is located 30 km from Matara and 69 km from Galle. The property is on a very well-maintained access road and only 5 minutes from the main road.
